definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，游客们休息了会儿，吃了点儿面包。

sentences.english: On my way home I stopped at my aunt's.
sentences.chinese: 回家途中我顺便到姑妈那儿去了一会儿。

sentences.english: You can also do another salt shot halfway through your run.
sentences.chinese: 跑步的半途中还可以再补一次盐。

sentences.english: During the voyage, he was terribly seasick and deported back to his home ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 因航行途中晕船厉害，被提前遣送回乡。

sentences.english: One day, on her way home, she met her friend Takong.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，在回家途中，她遇见了朋友大刚。

sentences.english: On the way back we stopped once more at the uncle's house in Kumjung.
sentences.chinese: 返程途中，我们又在昆坰那位大叔家稍事停留。

sentences.english: Do you think the Little Mermaid will be safe during her journey and stay in Shanghai?
sentences.chinese: 你认为小美人鱼前往上海途中及在上海期间是否安全？

sentences.english: Steady rollin woman gonna come my way.
sentences.chinese: 稳步辊女子前来自首途中。

sentences.english: This is one of the typical malay kampong house.
sentences.chinese: 在途中，您将通过典型的马来的房子。

sentences.english: Which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks, was on its way home.
sentences.chinese: 在巴伦支海搜寻了几个星期之后，正在返航途中。

sentences.english: The schoolgirls chippered on their way to school.
sentences.chinese: 女学生们在上学途中唧唧喳喳地说个不停。

sentences.english: On the way he came to know Levison and Major Baxter.
sentences.chinese: 途中，他认识了利维森和伯斯特少校。

sentences.english: Does this flight lie over at great fall on its way to New York City ?
sentences.chinese: 这班机去纽约途中要在大瀑布停留吗？

sentences.english: En route to the university , we saw a tail-gate party near the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去大学的途中，我们看到在体育馆边有个车后集会。

sentences.english: They’d spin as they gossiped and they’d spin as they walked to some other task.
sentences.chinese: 在闲聊时，在走向其任务的途中，她们都会纺纱。

sentences.english: So the damage must have taken place during transit.
sentences.chinese: 因此，货损肯定是在途中发生的。

definition: on the road/on a journey/road surface
along the sides of the road/by the wayside
to return to/to come (or go) back
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
along the way/the duration of a journey
